name: Mystery Box - Lite version
description:
Mystery Box - Lite version

Mystery Box is a puzzle game where you have to solve intriguing riddles to open boxes and get pieces to discover the history of the world's most popular inventions.

To unlock the boxes you have to interact with objects, handles, buttons, and wheels on each side. You can find puzzle pieces on a side of the boxes as well.

- - - -

Features:

• FREE TO PLAY

This Lite version allows you to play the first 3 Box packs (24 levels) for free

The Full version has 7 Box packs - 56 levels. Click here to download it!

• REALISTIC GRAPHICS

It feels like you're handling a real box in a dark room.

• DISCOVER INVENTIONS

Once you open all 8 boxes of a chosen pack, find hidden puzzle pieces to compose a figure and find out a brief history of the discovered invention.

• AMAZING PUZZLES

Think outside of the box to solve all riddles, it's not always easy.

Leonardo da Vinci would have a hard time opening all the boxes of this game!

• CHILLING BACKGROUND MUSIC

Play the game with your headphones to get totally immersed in it!

• GUARANTEED FUN

Like jack in the box games, or escape room games, Mystery Box will give you hours of fun and will also challenge your brain skills with some good tricky riddles

• VIDEO HINTS

In case you get stuck you can click the bulb button to watch a video that will help you solve puzzles and finish a level

• SHARE INVENTIONS

Get exposed on Twitter by sharing the game after completing an invention image on the Discovery screen. Let your community know what you're playing

• MULTIPLE LANGUAGES

Available in English*, German, French, Italian, Russian, Spanish, and Japanese

*English is the default language so you'll see it if your computer's language is different than the above-listed languages

TIP: In case a video hint won't play at first game start, just exit the level, enter it again and click the Hint button again.
